/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by tall apartment buildings, their blue and white facades standing out against the clear blue sky. The buildings are adorned with balconies and windows, adding to the urban charm of the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the cityscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, ready to whisk their owners away at a moment's notice.

The colors in the image are vibrant and varied, with the blue and white of the buildings contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
